page.title: 15Sport (2) at Mousehole
page.content: The{Mousehole Carnival Week}is organised by the supporters of the {Mousehole Association Football Club and is held in August. Throughout the week events such as Euchre/Whist Drives, Barbeques, Treasure Hunt, Tiny Tots etc. and culminating in the actual Carnival Parade through {Mousehole, Newlyn}and along{Penzance {Promenade. Since 1978{Mousehole}has had a {Rowing Club}which is mainly for young people. It was started with one boat but has now built up to four boats, two 18 feet boats which are rowed with two or four persons and a cox, and two 15 feet skifs which can be rowed by one, two or three persons. The club now attends competitions throughout the county of{Cornwall}and has achieved some success in these events.
